short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension automatically converts links from agents like CNFans, Hoobuy, AllChinaBuy MuleBuy and JoyaBuy to your preferred agent

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
When a default agent like CNFans or HooBuy is set, this extension will convert your any of the functional links automatically to your preferred site.

You no longer need to search for original product links or struggle to interpret agent links.

MyChinaFinds Link Converter is a tool designed to streamline your navigation through third-party agents. Its primary function is to allow users to effortlessly convert any existing links to their preferred format.

By clicking a link, the tool will automatically redirect you to the selected option, including the original format if desired.

In addition, this tool offers features that enhance your browsing experience by eliminating disruptive risk pop-ups and removing sign-in notifications on Taobao.

Affiliate programs may be utilized.
